request_parameter_descriptions.partition_times: list of time requested within (time format: YYYY-mm-ddTHH:MM:SS)
request_parameter_descriptions.output_dir: path of output dir (which must exist); by default soa_report_output within eps_package directory
request_parameter_descriptions.add_start_end_scenario: This flag must be set to 0/1 to allow/avoid the inclusion of periods from/util start/end eps_package window
request_parameter_descriptions.overwrite_periods: This allow to overwrite sub-periods distributing the corresponding DV in per experiment in % (only for target experiment types)
request_parameter_descriptions.include_power_metrics: Flag to enforce/avoid inclusion of power metrics; default is 1/true
request_parameter_descriptions.include_power_metrics_partition_details: [Optional] Flag to enforce/avoid inclusion of power metric partition; default is 0/false to reduce report size; take into account only if include_power_metrics=1/true
request_parameter_descriptions.include_instantaneous_data_rate_per_expe: Flag to enforce/avoid inclusion instantaneous data rate per experiment metrics; default is 1/true
request_parameter_descriptions.include_ssmm_status_per_instruments: [Optional] Flag to enforce/avoid inclusion of SSMM status per experiment; default True/0
request_parameter_descriptions.include_downlink_status_per_instruments: [Optional] Flag to enforce/avoid inclusion of donwlink status per experiment; default True/0
request_parameter_descriptions.battery_capacity_if_sim_not_run: Allows to set the battery capacity in case OSVE sim not run
